CustomField.description: A reg handler that implements the SSO Attribute Mapping custom metadata type will use this value to map to correct federation identifier field for that particular network. Example: LBP Community will point to LBPFederationIdentifier__c. This really is environment specific, so this potentially should be refactored at some point (or CI/CD to cover environment specific metadata deployment)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A reg handler that implements the SSO Attribute Mapping custom metadata type will use this value to map to correct federation identifier field for that particular network. Example: LBP Community will point to LBPFederationIdentifier__c
CustomField.label: Network Id
